value.title: Baidu says 2nd-gen Kunlun AI chips enter mass production
value.excerpt: BEIJING, Aug 18 (Reuters) - Chinese tech giant Baidu said on Wednesday it had begun mass-producing second-generation Kunlun artificial intelligence (AI) chips, as it races to become a key player in the chip industry which Beijing is trying to strengthen.

value.title: VVDN Technologies Joins NVIDIA Partner Network to Expand Opportunities for Advanced AI-Enabled Camera & Vision Applications
value.excerpt: VVDN Technologies, a premier electronic product engineering and manufacturing company, announced that it has joined the NVIDIA Partner Network (NPN) as a provider of AI-enabled computer vision solutions powered by the NVIDIA Jetson edge AI platform.

value.title: Samsung is using Artificial Intelligence to design its new Exynos chips

value.title: Samsung Joins Google and Nvidia in Using AI to Design Chips
value.excerpt: Samsung has reportedly started using artificial intelligence features in the Synopsys chip design tool for upcoming processors.

value.title: Samsung has its own AI-designed chip. Soon, others will too
value.excerpt: Samsung is using artificial intelligence to automate the insanely complex and subtle process of designing cutting-edge computer chips. The South Korean giant is one of the first chipmakers to use AI to create its chips.

value.title: Deep Learning Chip Market Trend, Forecast, Drivers, Restraints, Company Profiles and Key Players Analysis by 2028
value.excerpt: The global deep learning chip market is expected to reach a market size of USD 27.75 Billion by 2028 and register a high revenue CAGR, according to latest analysis by Emergen Research. Increasing quantum computing adoption is expected to drive global deep learning chip market growth to a significant extent during the forecast period.

value.title: KeepTruckin uses Ambarella AI chips to monitor truck drivers
value.excerpt: KeepTruckin will use Ambarella AI processors in its dashboard camera that can monitor both road conditions and driver awareness.
